entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate SourceNamespaceSymbol.ForceComplete member handling #71286
  • No errors reported at use-site for task type with inaccessible builder type #71283
  • The source generator fails with weird error messages, which don't express the true reason of failure. #71280
  • Replace GitHub automation for requiring reviews of PRs that cange the .NET SDK version #71275
  • Rationalize spread optimization targeting List when collection-expr contains spread values of ICollection type #71273

Closed

  • IDE0010 False positive case var #71281
  • Stack overflow in Rosyln CodeAnalysis when ambiguous name is used #71039
    17.9
  • Extend ReadOnlySpan optimization to all constant data #69472
    17.9
  • Type alias for function pointer fails to compile in cast expression #71278
  • Unused class generated when using Expression<Func<>> #71263

PullRequests

Created

  • Speed up integration test build by only building required dependencies #71289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Provide 'return' keyword in attribute context for accessor #71288
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix implementing abstract method with type parameter constaint on specific reference type #71287
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • For PR val only #71285
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not call Unsubst if it is not available due to argument processing #71282
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • [Attempt #2] Do not report separate diagnostics just for fading #71277
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Remove GitHub automation requiring reviews when the SDK version changes #71276
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #71274
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Split integration test build from test run #71166
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue when we report a missing default case in switch statements with patterns #71284
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify some MEF imports/exports #71272
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Do not resolve diagnostics early during attribute binding #71140
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove extra backslash from IBC script #71264
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Localize 17.9 branch #71249
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix the binlog version mismatch in 17.8 #71255
  • Revert "Merge pull request #71258 from mavasani/RemoveFadingDiagnostics" #71269
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Collection expression spread optimization #71195
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add OrchardCore test to OptProf config #69909
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Params Collections: Implement "Better function member" section of the proposal #71271
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Use CPS for tests where saving documents needs to be reliable #70983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Allow collection expressions with `CreateCompilation` #71134
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged
  • Extract compilation-tracker/SG-production code out of SolutionState to a new owner. #71257
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement json serialization/deserialization for LSP json messages. Part 2/N #68990
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize singleton list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #71147
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Support code folding for argument lists #71064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Standardize use of prepareMachine for ci cleanup #71265
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Use runtime helper `CreateSpan` for `stackalloc` of non-byte arrays #71261
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Implement json serialization/deserialization for LSP json messages. Part 1/N. #71141
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not compile all types during ENC #71254
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Only apply one document info change for linked documents #71220
    Area-IDE, untriaged
